frontmatter.title: Google Petitions to Donate Istio Service Mesh to CNCF
frontmatter.author: Container Journal
frontmatter.description: Google and Istio Steering Committee submit Istio service mesh to CNCF for incubation, aiming for closer collaboration with Kubernetes. Service mesh competition focuses on feature richness and applicability to both cloud-native and legacy environments, becoming integral in DevOps workflows.
